original_text: Then he shall offer from it, as his offering for a food offering to the Lord, the fat covering the entrails and all the fat that is on the entrails
korean_text: 그는 그 중에서 예물을 가져다가 여호와께 화제를 드릴지니 곧 내장에 덮인 기름과 내장에 붙은 모든 기름과

sentences.original_text: Then he shall offer from it
as his offering for a food offering to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 주께 드리는 식물 제물로 그의 제물로 삼아

sentences.original_text: and all the fat that is on the entrails
